title: Patient Access Representative Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: Great company, I went through about two rounds of interviews. The first was with one of the mangers of the department and the second was with a panel of other mangers and unit coordinators.
Interview Questions: Tell us about your self.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX)
Interview Descriptions: These are the some questions the interviewer asked for the interview Where you see you in next five years and what are your plans. Tell about a situation you dealt with a difficult patient and or family member
Interview Questions: List your experience which you had

title: Human Resources Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: Wasn’t the best interview. Pretty average interview. Didn’t hear back after they said they’d reach back out for an update whether negative or positive. Wouldn’t recommend but also the interviewers were probably busy.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your experience

title: Marketing Interview
Application Type: The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (New York, NY)
Interview Descriptions: The recruiter was very friendly and shared a list of benefits. Unfortunately, while I was interviewed twice for two different jobs, I was also ghosted twice. Giant slap in the face.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: New Grad RN Residency Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System in Feb 2023
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was great. Interview was conducted in a meeting room with the department director, floor manager and residency teacher. They were all very personable, welcoming, and not intimidating.
Interview Questions: Can you me about yourself?

title: Management Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Methodist Health System in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: Long process involving multiple individuals, but everyone was pleasant, and the interviews were comfortable. I feel like benefits and salary transparency would be beneficial on the front end instead of waiting until the offer is given.
Interview Questions: How can you be an effective leader?

title: Medical Scribe Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: Phone call with the head scribe also had a medical terminology test. The first two weeks were paid training training in the Emergency department. Overall it was a straightforward process.
Interview Questions: Why are you a good fit for this role?

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Oct 2022
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was seamless and easy. I was asked about myself and then my interviewer asked me if I had any questions, which I decided to ask about the position, company culture, opportunities for growth, and characteristics of a great employer.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself and goals?

title: Medical Laboratory Scientist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: The Interview was on site and in person. It was with only one person who was the supervisor. I lasted about forty five minutes and included a tour of the work environment.
Interview Questions: How do you handle policies that you don't agree with?

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: My interview was friendly and straightforward! The lady's I spoke with were very sweet and really interested in getting to know me. I felt very welcomed and comfortable. Very easy process
Interview Questions:
What made you become a nurse?
How do you deal with conflict?
What are your strengths and weaknesses?

title: License Practical Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions:
Being able to utilize my skills as a practical nurse and help out on the floor when nurses were struggling to be staffed adequately

When those staff members are short staffed I would like to be able to help them out and be of use to them
Interview Questions:
What was the one thing that I declined at the moment



Being able to work overtime on the floor utilizing my skills

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: Nurse manager called me to interview with a panel.  Comfortable interview with great questions. Then I went to see the unit and talk to more employees it was a great experience
Interview Questions: Previous experiences and why I want to work there

title: Graduate Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: The HR person never picked up my call once I arrived, so I had to wait for 30 min in the lobby without any information..then she showed up and led me to the manager. She talked about the unit, then asked only about myself. It ended too quickly.
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourself, 
that's it..

title: Executive Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: Very easy and collaborative process. Initial screening interview was with the actual supervisor and not an HR screener, which was appreciated. The process was quick and the interviews felt informal and conversational.
Interview Questions: What do you think has prepared you for this position?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was very easy. First I had a short interview with a recruiter, just talking about my goals and expectations. Then interview with the unit manager, about 30 minutes. All typical interview questions, why I want to work there, my experience, what I will bring to the unit. I found out I was hired the following day
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Director Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: It was long but I appreciate the focus on finding the right candidate  (for both the candidate and department). The right fit is important to the company. I had multiple interviews in the process.
Interview Questions: 5 year goal in career

title: Registered Nurse, Emergency Department Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: I  applied online for the Charlton location and scheduled an interview with the manager. I arrived to the interview, which was like three hours away, and was informed that the manager had "an emergency". I was given a card for the business person by the charge nurse. I called and emailed the person. Never heard from the person. So I emailed the manager who I was schedule to have the interview with and received an automatic email, in which the manager was no longer affiliated with the company. Very  disrespectful to my time and the place seemed unorganized.
Interview Questions: An actual interview never took place

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: The interview for the nurse residency program had two different panels. One of other staff RNs and others with management. There was multiple people being interviewed at once but we went In separately
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years

title: COVID-19 Screener Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: Very Informal, met with the director of volunteer services and was asked 5ish questions.  All very easy, some behavioral questions. Most questions were about past situation experience and how I would react in certain situations.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time you did not agree with someone in a leadership role and how you approached the situation.

title: Clinical Team Lead Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: Peer staff interview asking pre selected questions provided by Manager.  Questions were mostly about how you would respond in adverse situations.  Both co workers were known to me and were hand selected by Manager- one from the night shift and one from the day shift.
Interview Questions: "What do you do on your down time?"

title: Clinical Research Scientist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: Two interviews in person after a phone screen, with the second interview set up to meet the different groups of people we’d be working with. Both interviews were an hour or two long.
Interview Questions: What is your favorite part of research?

title: Graduate Nurse Residency Program Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: Due to my location, I used Zoom to talk to a panel of critical care staff. The interview was laid back and the panel made me feel at ease talking to them. They asked about 5 questions and then I asked mine. It was a really positive experience.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 3 years? 5 years?

title: ICU Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: Did first interview over zoom and then second interview in person, which was way better. Not hard questions, scenarios and describing self was important part. There were educators, manager and even directors.
Interview Questions: As stated previously, scenarios and questions to describe one's work and character.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (San Antonio, TX)
Interview Descriptions: Easy and laid back friendly staff know cores and values and mission on hospital first is interview with recruiter then peer interview asked about 12 questions let you know offer of Job in about 2 weeks
Interview Questions:
What is my every day role in current job?
Where do I see myself in 5 years?
What is my background in nursing?

title: Patient Registration Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Richardson, TX) in Dec 2020
Interview Descriptions: Basic personal and scenario questions. Super quick and easy. Just go in and be yourself. The job duties are pretty much repetitive. You just have to be able to work non-stop. Show them that you’re willing to go above and beyond.
Interview Questions: What would you do if your co worker is slacking on their work leaving you do to most of the work? Would you say something or no?

title: Certified Nursing Assistant (CNA) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Memphis, TN) in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: Panel type interview with a group of 6 managers. It was a comfortable environment. I was asked about 5 questions which were situational based. The interview lasted about 10 / 15 minutes.
Interview Questions: They asked why I wanted to work with Methodist in particular.

title: Clinical Reseach Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: Short 30 minute phone conversation, where I described my back ground and they asked very basic questions, and I received more information about the position, more of a phone screening than an interview
Interview Questions: What interests you in this position?

title: Mlt Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: After apply an application, they send some link for assessment. Assessment question took around 20 minutes. Then HR employer contacted me with call and email. She set up zoom meeting date with manager of department that I applied.
Interview Questions: What is your short term and long term goal?

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: Lasted about 30 minutes. The interview had 2 parts. You sit with the original interviewer and then you are asked to sit in another room with CNAs and they interview you as well.
Interview Questions: Tell us about your yourself.

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions: I submitted my resume, got an email inviting me to interview. It was a virtual interview with the director. Scheduling took a couple of weeks to work out but the interview itself was under an hour long.
Interview Questions: What experience did I have that would be relevant to this position?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions: It was a panel interview. It took about an hour. Nurse manager was very pleasant. Questions were mostly behavioral. They also have you meet some RNs on the unit who ask questions as well. Everyone is very nice it is not an intimidating process.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 2 years? 5 years?

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Omaha, NE) in Feb 2020
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed with the nurse manager, was asked situational questions, then talked about the hospital some and what goes on for benefits.   It was very laid back and they seamed very nice during the entire process.
Interview Questions: Tell me a time when something went wrong and you had to fix it for a patient or customer?

title: Pharmacy Operations Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 8 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Simple, straightforward answers. Director seemed more interested in tearing apart answers than getting to know you. The other staff were more approachable and interested in knowing how I would fit in with the group.
Interview Questions: 1. How long is the commute for you. 2. How do you handle difficult employees 3. How long do you plan on staying here

title: Nurse Resident Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: It was a group interview with four other candidates for Methodist Mansfield. It was really informal, and it seemed pretty disorganized--they gave the wrong room number and zero directions on where to go. We did a short tour of the facility afterward. Never received an email or a call back.
Interview Questions: Strengths, weaknesses, challenge

title: Care Transitions Navigator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions:
Called in my HR for interview. Quick and Easy to Set up. 

2 in - person group interviews with Director of Case Management and then 2 staff members. Was asked questions in both interviews and was given expectations of job. 
Was told about when starting time would possibly be if hired and training required.
Interview Questions: Most difficult case with a client

title: Entry Level Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX)
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was quick with 3 individuals. The nurse manager, nurse coordinator, and nurse educator. A lot of personanality questions. Interview was relaxed. The process took about 2 weeks total. They talked about base salary as an entry level nurse. Preceptorship is also talked about.
Interview Questions: Give an instance where you had to work as a team?

title: RN Resident Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: I applied online. The nurse manager and staff were very friendly. It was a pretty easy interview. The manager let me know she liked me immediately so I felt great about the interview, however, the position was filled internally.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: I got an email after a month for a panel interview. I thought it went well and then I got call from the manager for another interview. She made me feel comfortable and also gave me the opportunity to talk with other nurses. Got a call from her again after two days saying there is a spot left but she is waiting for another call before deciding. Never got a call back.
Interview Questions: How would you handle a difficult patient?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: I went to the meet and greet. It was a great opportunity to meet the directors and learn about the departments. Some of them I talked with quite a bit and others had already made up their mind before I had even sat down with them
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself

title: Certified Surgical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 days. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Mansfield, TX) in Oct 2018
Interview Descriptions: Panel of peers and nurses that asked a variety of questions about previous job experience. Also, questions about teamwork and communication. They also asked about shift preference and family life.
Interview Questions: How do you handle communication with surgeons and nursing staff?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: one interview, then they called and offered me the job. the interview was more of a conversation than an interview. It was one of the easier interviews ive participated in
Interview Questions: how do you take care of your mental health

title: Registered Nurse, Emergency Room Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: Very pleasant experience, the interviewers asked questions that relate well to the work environment (how do you handle pressure, multiple projects, etc). Very attentive and respectful, genuinely interested and listened (they asked questions based on what I would say).
Interview Questions: How do you handle a difficult or demanding patient when you are faced with multiple projects?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Baytown, TX)
Interview Descriptions: Rude and horrible at interviewing. Job fair that had very limited positions so they were very uninterested in interviewing so many potential candidates. It was late in the day and they had already made their minds up. Job fairs are a waste of time.
Interview Questions: They did not ask questions just left the interview up to the person.

title: Medical Laboratory Scientist Interview
Application Type: The process took 6 days. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (San Antonio, TX) in Dec 2017
Interview Descriptions: Fast process, friendly staff, after applying the next day i had phone interview then onsite interview. Asked several questions about experiences. I thought it was a great interview but no offer.
Interview Questions: Are u a supporter or leader?

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System in Oct 2017
Interview Descriptions: Did the application in line and within a few hours got an email to do a video interview. Happily I did it right away and waited over two weeks to hear a response. Eventually got the job. Long process.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions: I applied 8/28 recieved an application follow up email a month a later 9/25. I interview that folllwing Wednesday. HR was very nice.  Interview with the nursing manager and the floor nursing supervisor. Asked generic questions about my past history. Called a pct to show me around the floor
Interview Questions: Tell us a little about you.

title: Registered Dietitian Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Richardson, TX) in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions: Methodist is very straight forward in their interview process. I applied online 1-2 days after the job was posted. They called me 2 days later and wanted to schedule a phone interview for the following Monday. The interview was ~40 minutes and included multiple clinical skills type questions.
Interview Questions: What references/resources do you use when researching best practices for tubefeeding?

title: Echo Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions: panel the majority of the team was present. then they all asked questions. after the questions I was asked to do a scanning interview. everybody seemed nice their were behavioral questions and pathology questions.
Interview Questions: describe a difficult situation with coworker

title: RN, Bsn Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Mansfield, TX) in Aug 2017
Interview Descriptions: Very formal and I was able to meet the unit staff and all my questions were answered. The unit staff did a peer interview with me too, so it was nice to hear what they say about the unit.
Interview Questions: If we offer you the position, what do you have to offer to the company?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Jun 2017
Interview Descriptions: Very thorough.  Several tests administered.  Lengthy interview process.  Very fair about method.  Human Resources Department is very good about processing resumes and contacting potential candidates.  Is a great place to WORK!
Interview Questions: What is one character weakness that you would like to improve?

title: Contract Analyst - Supply Chain Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: The process was long, time consuming and was given mixed messages throughout the process. Was given an offer that was a significant pay cut from my current position which I eventually accepted only to have it rescinded. Worst hiring experience of my life.
Interview Questions: Standard questions for industry.

title: RN Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: Group Interview  with asking questions and individual interviews with the managers. I was given individual scenarios and asked what I would do. They questioned my experience and told me what was expected of me.
Interview Questions: What is your experience?

title: Critical Care Residency, RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX)
Interview Descriptions: Interview in front of two panels, one panel of nurse leadership, one of staff nurses. They ask three different questions and grade you 1-5 for each question.  Then you find out in about two weeks whether you got it or not. Depending on unit needs they usually hire between ten and twenty and usually interview about one hundred to 150
Interview Questions: Tell me about a slow time in your previous job and what you did during it

title: Graduate Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: Completed online app, recruiter Jose contacted me, interviewed with Del. I dressed professionally thought Interview went great but looking back she didn't take notes, didn't ask typical interview questions. Her mind was already made up.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Dec 2016
Interview Descriptions: I applied online.  Human resources contacted me to set up an interview within a few days.  It was a small panel.  It was very laid back and interviewers were very friendly and personable. Heard back quite quickly.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here? Lots of behavioral type questions.

title: Intern - Hourly Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Jul 2016
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview for 20 mins. Most of the interview questions were simple and straight to the points. Such as qualification, major, previous work experience and so on. They had minimum requirement of 4 references who had to reply online regarding the candidates behavior.
Interview Questions: Why you choose to work for Methodist Health System?

title: Clinical Research Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and received a call from their recruiter after 4 weeks. The recruiter only called me to schedule a phone interview with the hiring manager. The hiring manager was kind and professional. She asked me a few questions regarding my background and interest. She also shared information with me the regarding the position I applied for. At the end of the 30 minutes phone interview, she told me the HR will contact me whether I will be invited to the onsite interview. If I am invited, expect that will be a half day interview, meeting most of the doctors and staff I will be working closely with. However, I decided not to proceed the interview process because this job requires some evening or weekend hours. Anyways, it was pleasant experience.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to apply to this job? Why MHS? What do you want to do in the future? Why do you think you are a competent candidate for this position?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: Received email from Human Resources that Unit Manager wanted to meet with me.  Reported to HR and was escorted to the floor for interview.  Interviewed with Unit Manager and Clinical Coordinator.  Toured unit after interview with Clinical Coordinator and went back to HR.
Interview Questions: Have you ever worked with someone who was negative, how did you handle it?

title: Manager Position Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Methodist Health System in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: very informal, I'm still awaiting the next step in the process as I was told that this was level 1. I have not heard back as to whether I will go further in the process.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Emergency Department Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX)
Interview Descriptions: Several panel type interview processes.  There were multiple trips to this location for panel type interviews as well as employee health screening.  I spent almost 2 full days of panel reviews with employees, managers as well as upper administration prior to receiving an offer for the position.
Interview Questions: What are your goals and vision for this department

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (San Antonio, TX) in Dec 2015
Interview Descriptions: Peer Interview over 2 days. First day was will other program managers, the next interview was with director.  Got off within 3 days. Waited week until final offer came in from HR
Interview Questions: Focus on conflict resolution

title: Respiratory Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: Friendly atmosphere. One of the best interview I had. Wonderful experience, friendly people, great interviewers. Very nice facility. You have to take a writing Skills test. You have to go thru 3 types of interviews: a phone interview with the recruiter, a second interview with the director and a third interview with peers. They were all very easy, no pressure.
Interview Questions: Are you very reliable?

title: Registered Dietitian Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Sept 2015
Interview Descriptions: Lengthy with drawn out process. There was a panel of people who were apart of the interview which seemed appropriate and fair for them to have a balanced group of people assessing the interviewee.
Interview Questions: My experience in GI nutrition

title: Regulatory Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 months. I interviewed at Methodist Health System in Jun 2015
Interview Descriptions: I had applied for the position in Feb 2015 and didnt receive an interview until June 2015. The interview was one on one with the director. Really general questions. HR took about 2 weeks to respond. A lot of the paperwork was not completed correctly. Apparently a 3rd party does background checks.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your past experience

title: Certified Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Dec 2014
Interview Descriptions: Apply on line, interview with Director, get offer from HR.Submit to drug test, TB test, and get current on immunizations. Submit to blood draw and physical for health insurance. Go to orientation and spend all day listening to everything about Methodist Hospital.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to do this? It is a hard job.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: Interview with Nurse Manager. The process took two weeks. Standard interview questions. Received offer on the spot and accepted. Not much more to it than that. I don't know what else to write.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself? Why nursing? Why Methodist?

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Dec 2014
Interview Descriptions: Interview process took a few weeks, maybe two or three. There was a phone interview with a recruiter first. That went well, this was my first medical job interview so I was extremely nervous for the sit down interview that came next. I had a one on one with the director of the unit I was applying for. I was glad it was only her any more people and I don't think I would've done very good.
Interview Questions: How would you deal with negativity?

title: Equipment Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Nov 2014
Interview Descriptions: Took 10 days total. HR was very friendly. I had a very brief screening over the phone with HR. The real interview was with 3 people from management team. It was very friendly and non intimidating
Interview Questions: What is needed in ICU

title: Patient Account Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: wonderful experience. wonderful interview. great interviewer. felt at ease with the person doing the interview. got a nice tour of the facility. met all of the employees. everyone seemed nice. great atmosphere.
Interview Questions: describe yourself

title: Contractiing Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Health System
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and get a call back within 3 days.The person interviewing me was late (30 min) and during the interviewed their body language was very unprofessional. Overall, very unprofessional experience. However the recruiter was very nice and professional. I am sure that they are more organized then that but I was offended.
Interview Questions: I wasn't asked many questions. It was more like a conversation and the only question I remember from that experience was "Tell me about yourself".

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 7 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Mansfield, TX) in Oct 2013
Interview Descriptions: Interview went very well.  The hospital is a beautiful facility.  The manager was very pleasant but appeared to be busy.
Interview Questions: What would have you learned and what would you change about yourself as it relates to your career

title: Case Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Mansfield, TX) in Apr 2012
Interview Descriptions: It was minimal and not behaviorial based.  There was a lot of talking but interviewers did not seem prepared.  I hade to interject information about myself and my career that was not asked as I felt it would be pertinent to the decision to hire.  The role was described as  case coordinator but actually it was a UR Job.
Interview Questions: How long have you been a case manager.

title: Emergency Room Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Mar 2012
Interview Descriptions: Panel interview with management and staff.  Asked standard situational and behavioral questions and asked for specific examples of each.  Was asked to give examples of different times I was placed in a stressful situation and how I handled it.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in Mar 2012
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was pretty straight forward.  Able to meet with those I'd be working with on a daily basis.  There were no tricky questions to throw me off.  They wanted to know about my character and work ethic.  The question on strengths and weaknesses was asked.
Interview Questions: What made you interested in research.

title: Respiratory Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Methodist Health System (Dallas, TX) in May 2010
Interview Descriptions: I was contacted by their HR person who set up an interview. At the interview, I was interviewed by the department head and two team leaders. Everyone was incredibly friendly and accommodating. I was asked simple questions like strengths vs. weaknesses, what am I looking for in an employer, what type of hours can I work, etc. Afterwards, I took a test that had pretty basic respiratory care concepts.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths? What are your weaknesses?
